dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of conversations between crowdworkers who were randomly paired and asked to act the part of a given provided persona. The dataset is designed to facilitate research into creating more consistent and engaging chatbots by endowing them with a persona.
dcterms:title: Persona-Chat Dataset

dcterms:description: An extended version of the Persona-Chat dataset, including additional data for training, validation, and testing. The dataset is designed to evaluate chatbots in multi-turn conversations and includes rewritten personas to avoid word overlap.
dcterms:title: ConvAI2 Dataset
